queryMap.query: SELECT /* e07050010_s01 */ A.RACER_NO ,B.NM_KOR RACER_NM ,A.ENGM_NM ,GET_DEC(A.ENGM_RES_NO) ENGM_RES_NO ,A.INSU_CD ,GET_CD_NM('E00143',A.INSU_CD) INSU_NM ,A.INSU_NO ,A.INSU_AMT ,A.ENGM_YN ,A.RENT_CNT ,A.REG_DT ,A.RMK ,B.RACER_STAT_CD ,GET_CD_NM('E00017',B.RACER_STAT_CD) RACER_STAT_NM FROM TBEG_INSUPEN_MST A, TBEC_RACER_MASTER B WHERE A.RACER_NO = B.RACER_NO AND B.NM_KOR LIKE ?||'%' ORDER BY RACER_NO
SELECT /* e07050010_s02 */ A.RACER_NO FROM TBEG_INSUPEN_MST A WHERE A.RACER_NO = ?

INSERT INTO TBEG_INSUPEN_MST ( RACER_NO, ENGM_NM, ENGM_RES_NO, INSU_CD, INSU_NO, INSU_AMT, ENGM_YN, REG_DT, RMK, INST_ID, INST_DT, UPDT_ID, UPDT_DT ) VALUES(?,?,PUT_ENC(?),?,?,?,'1',?,?,?,SYSDATE,?,SYSDATE)
UPDATE /* e07050010_u01 */ TBEG_INSUPEN_MST SET ENGM_NM=?, ENGM_RES_NO=PUT_ENC(?), INSU_CD=?, INSU_NO=?, INSU_AMT=?, ENGM_YN=?, REG_DT=?, RMK=?, UPDT_ID=?, UPDT_DT=SYSDATE WHERE RACER_NO = ?
